column1: Well um, let me ask you this. Why? Wher-where do you think… Mr. Hat… went?
Well… I guess, I-I see what you're saying. Yeah.
It-it's j-just-- It's just a question.
Well, I believe you, I... absolutely believe you.
That I did not need to know.

Mr. Garrison, I think that Mr. Hat was actually your gay side trying to come out. You see, it's-it's you that's gay, but, but you're in denial, so...you act out your gay persona with a homosexual puppet.  What do you think about that?
